Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MessagesToClient

Class GameSetMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MessagesToClient.MessageToClient
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MessagesToClient.GameSetMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameSetMessage
extends MessageToClient
GameSetMessage Class defines attributes and methods needed to correctly create a copy of the Model's Game inside the Client's View.

Attributes:

  • ArrayList<Player> "players": Contains all View-readable Players of the Model's Game
  • RedDevelopmentCardTable "table": The Game's DevelopmentCardTable
  • RedMarket "market": The Game's Market
  • RedFaithTrack "faithTrack": The Game's FaithTrack
See Also:
Serialized Form
